New Records: It was a career-best night for rookie sensation Dalton Knecht, who finished with 27 points and five threes.
Key Match Events: LeBron James' 21 points helped pave the way to the fifth consecutive victory for the Lakers.
With 38 seconds remaining and Los Angeles up by one point, James pulled up at the top of the key to drain a huge three.
Anthony Davis recorded his third 30-plus point game in his last five appearances.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort, making it clear that he's still the most reliable scorer down the stretch.
The Lakers improve to 9-4 under head coach JJ Redick.
